fullText: It’s got major names (Steve Carell is carrying the autumn roses and the gun), a major stage at Lincoln Center’s Vivian Beaumont, and a palpably earnest desire to excavate the story’s humanity. And it is, unhappily, an example of how all these things can fail to cohere into something powerful. Like its luckless hero, it shoots and misses.
showScoreExcerpt: "Intertwined issues of script, casting, and direction are at work here."

keyPhrases.quote: Intertwined issues of script, casting, and direction are at work here
